channel.title: Bored of making RS2 private servers? why not make your own game
channel.description:
well i was looking at it and seeing how its free and all i figured why the hell dont i give it out to the public of mopar scape :).... its fairly cool.. i jsut downloaded it last night and im having a blast right now making my OWN things not copyright things from other companys AKA jagex..... here try it out i wanna see how far we all can get.....
[url=http://www.klinksoftware.com/] http://www.klinksoftware.com/ [/url]

lol everyone has there opinion i just thot that ppl here wuld like this bc they r all always trying to make there own playable game… if your a mod and u dont like this post lock it and del it… dont flame me for trying to help… pls

item.title: Bored of making RS2 private servers? why not make your own game
item.dc:creator: @HoMM HoMM
item.description:
@HoMM wrote:

PKOwner:

GameMaker SUX!

[quote=“PKOwner, post:12, topic:40249”]Also use RPG Maker XP
But it sux if u dunno ruby scripting[/quote]

Game Maker surely pwns compared to RPG Maker… Game Maker is meant for people who want to create something fun without learning to script. Also Game Maker is good for experient scripters as it allowes to script the same things but faster. Game Maker is very powerful, as it can run dll’s, execute applications and play songs/background music/sounds very easily during the game.
If you don’t like it, its not my problem, but don’t flame if you dont know anything.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia

@alexia wrote:

Both of those programs suck. If you want something like that, use Multimedia Fusion. If you want something good, don’t use a program at all and code it all by hand.

-Alexia

item.dc:creator: @HoMM HoMM
item.description:
@HoMM wrote:

(before reading this ready MY post above a few posts)

Game Maker is good: It can be used even to make 3D games, MO’s (though 2D, as 3D would lag like hell) and single player be made such to send data to your mysql+php website to make a highscore or something like that.

item.title: Bored of making RS2 private servers? why not make your own game
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

These GUIs will never build you a MO nor a MMO. They are just for people that do not know one thine about programming. It takes programming knowledge, advanced sound effects, advanced GFX, and much more skills plus a team of developers to create a game.

Read full topic

item.title: Bored of making RS2 private servers? why not make your own game
item.dc:creator: @HoMM HoMM
item.description:
@HoMM wrote:

Yoyo Games

Make 2D Games with GameMaker | YoYo Games

Making top 2D games with the GameMaker: Studio game engine is easy. No code or programming required

A VERY easy tool to make games if you learn it, they might not be as good as runescape but they can be really fun. Though it needs registration, who says you cant find something (illegal something lol) from google, or pming me.
